IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: We are trusted by our community to provide exceptional, comprehensive care in the home.
IRS990.MissionDesc: Community Nurse Home Care, Inc. provides high quality, cost effective, comprehensive home health, hospice and palliative care services to the diverse community of Southeastern Massachusetts.
IRS990.Desc: Community Nurse Home Care, Inc. provides an array of high quality, cost effective, comprehensive home health, hospice, palliative care and other related services to the diverse community of Southeastern Massachusetts.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Association is a public charity under Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code. As a public charity, the Association is exempt from state and federal income taxes on income earned in accordance with its tax exempt purpose. Unrelated business income is subject to state and federal income tax. Management has evaluated the Association's tax positions and concluded that the Association has no unrelated business income or uncertain tax positions that require adjustment to the financial statements.
Change in Fair Value of Beneficial Interest in Perpetual Trust -172,194.
Lisa Parent, CEO and Sandra Dompierre, Chief Clincial Officer both received bonuses during the year. Bonuses were voted on and approved by the Board of Directors.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: Employed by CNHC as the Hospice Director

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Board Treasurer receives and reviews the 990, and all other board members are notified that there is a copy available for review at the association.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Board of Directors reviews annually and discloses any conflicts.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CEO compared with other organizations by Board and approved by the Board annually. CEO is the only employee under contract by the Board.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization makes its Form 990 and audited financial statements available to the public on request.
